title: Define Smart Grid Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the intelligent power grid, including the hardware and software components.

title: Develop Intelligent Energy Distribution Algorithm
description: Create an algorithm that optimizes energy distribution for efficiency and durability.

title: Implement Real-time Monitoring System
description: Design and implement a system for real-time monitoring of the power grid's performance.

title: Create User Interface for Grid Management
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for managing the smart grid.

title: Design Database Structure for Smart Grid Data
description: Design the structure of the database to store data from the smart grid.

title: Implement Data Security Measures
description: Design and implement security measures to protect the smart grid data.
dependencies: Create User Interface for Grid Management
Design Database Structure for Smart Grid Data

title: Perform System Integration and Testing
description: Integrate all components of the smart grid system and conduct extensive testing.
dependencies: Create User Interface for Grid Management
Design Database Structure for Smart Grid Data

title: Prepare Technical Documentation
description: Write technical documentation explaining the design, implementation, and operation of the smart grid.
